text:
道を下っていくと
最近夫を亡くした
女性に出会いました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #D5C2DE;left: 2.58%;top: 61.57%;width: 32.00%;height: 6.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #F9BBC8;left: 51.08%;top: 11.51%;width: 20.97%;height: 3.08%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #D5C2DE;left: 63.08%;top: 14.71%;width: 13.83%;height: 2.85%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
女性の足音が
虚しく響きました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #D5C2DE;left: 57.58%;top: 25.39%;width: 23.50%;height: 5.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
嘆く未亡人は
悲しい目で彼女を見ました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: #D5C2DE;left: 66.92%;top: 38.20%;width: 30.50%;height: 4.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text: 私はもう何も愛さない
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #8E71B3;left: 11.75%;top: 69.63%;width: 51.33%;height: 3.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text: そう言って女は去った
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #D5C2DE;left: 75.58%;top: 90.04%;width: 21.67%;height: 3.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
